materials: Plastic #1 (PETE); Plastic #2 (HDPE); Plastic #2 (Color HDPE); Plastic #3 (PVC); Plastic #4 (LDPE); Plastic #5 (Polypropylene); Plastic #7; Aluminum Cans; Glass (Blue); Books (Reuse); Book Recycling; Glass (Brown); Brown Paper Bags; Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Cardboard; Catalogs; Chipboard; Glass (Clear); Clothing; Compact Fluorescent Lights; Computer Monitors; Computer Paper; Computer (Recycling); Drink Boxes; Electronics; Ferrous Metals (Steel or Iron); Fluorescent Lamps/Tubes; Gift Bags; Gift Boxes; Glass (Green); Greeting Cards; Furniture; Household Goods; Large Household Appliances; Magazines; Bed Mattresses; Clothes Hangers (Metal); Milk Cartons; Paper (Mixed); Newspapers; Ni-Cd Batteries; Non-ferrous (Copper/Brass/Tin); Office Furniture; Ornaments; Packing Peanut (Reuse); Paperboard; Phone books; Propane Tank Exchange; Batteries (Rechargeable); Televisions; Tin or Steel Cans; Used Tires; Office Paper; MP3 Players
notes: This new Transfer and Recycling Center is open to all residents, non residents and businesses. There is a Facility sticker required to use the site. All trash must be in Athol Town PAYT bags.
